titles.title: Providing for savings in the operations of the House of Representatives to be achieved by transferring functions to private sector entities and eliminating staff positions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 6/29/1993--Introduced. Requires the Speaker of the House of Representatives to take necessary actions to transfer the House Restaurant System, the House Post Office, the House Barbershop, the House Beauty Shop, and their activities to the private sector in order to achieve specified annual cost savings and staff reductions.
